com.nxp.id.jcopx
Class BACAcceleratorException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class BACAcceleratorException
extends java.lang.Exception

Exception class used by the BACAccelerator for BAC compliant secure messaging.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static short BAC_BAD_PADDING
          Wrong padding in decryption of the APDU command data This might be: Wrong padding indicator (0x01) in DO87 Padding does not end with 0x80 0x00*
static short BAC_CRYPTO_OPERATION_FAILED
          An error occured while creating a MAC or decrypting data
static short BAC_DER_ENCODING_ERROR
          An error occured in the decoding of a DER data object (wrong tag bytes, length of BER length field larger than latest ISO7816-4 specifications allow).
static short BAC_DO_UNEXPECTED
          Wrong combination of INS byte and DO87/DO85 For DO87 the INS byte needs to be odd For DO85 the INS byte needs to be even
static short BAC_DO8E_MISSING
          Mandatory secure messaging Data Object (DO8E) not found in command APDU
static short BAC_ERROR_APDU_BUFFER_OVERFLOW
          The calculated response message length does not fit into APDU buffer
static short BAC_ERROR_DES_CRYPT
          An error occured while encrypting the response message
static short BAC_ERROR_DES_CRYPT_TOO_MANY_BLOCKS
          The data length for encryption or decryption using DES is too long
static short BAC_ERROR_DES_LOADKEY
          An error during DES key loading occured
static short BAC_ERROR_DES_MAC
          An error occured while MAC calculation of response message
static short BAC_ERROR_DES_MAC_TOO_MANY_BLOCKS
          The data length to calculate MAC is too long
static short BAC_ERROR_DO8E_ENCODING
          The length encoding in DO8E is not supported
static short BAC_ERROR_RESPONSE_APDU_OVERFLOW
          The calculated response message length is too long for standard APDU buffer size
static short BAC_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_DO97
          The length encoding in DO97 is not supported
static short BAC_MAC_VERIFICATION_FAILED
          APDU MAC verification failed
static short BAC_WRONG_LENGTH
          Invalid length value of an array.

Constant Field Values

BAC_BAD_PADDING

public static final short BAC_BAD_PADDING
Wrong padding in decryption of the APDU command data This might be:
  • Wrong padding indicator (0x01) in DO87
  • Padding does not end with 0x80 0x00*

Constant Field Values

BAC_WRONG_LENGTH

public static final short BAC_WRONG_LENGTH
Invalid length value of an array. This can be the case if
  • the DO87 has a to long lenth encoded or
  • the Lc in extended length APDU is longer than data fit into APDU buffer
  • a parsing error would lead to a ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

See Also:
